Our company is looking for someone to generate leads and handle marketing in order to expand our marketing base. Benefits include setting your own hours, and wages are based on overall sales generated by the company in proportion to the number of hours put in. If you have a passion for marketing and are looking for an opportunity to grow with a company, this could be the perfect fit for you!
